attributes.action: Hold a General Election immediately, no ifs, no buts, no excuses.
attributes.additional_details:
The acrimony and bitterness infecting families, friendships and local communities, even the parliamentary community, can only start to fade and heal when we have a general election. More referendums will create more rancour.
After an election we will all have the opportunity to to rediscover the respect and kindness that make our United Kingdom great.
attributes.background: The current Parliamentary logjam can only be broken by the one party to our splendidly flexible constitution that has not had a say yet: the electorate.
